name: Sembl
body:
### What exactly is this page for?
If it's to give prospective contributors a nice introduction to the Sembl project, here are links to the [live games](http://play.sembl.net/), and to the Sembl [website](http://sembl.net). I should tell you that I conceived of Sembl and directed the production but I haven't ever worked in the code. (I'm not unwilling, but it's a learning-cliff I haven't yet scaled.)

### Or is it about me rather than the project?
I'm [on Twitter](https://twitter.com/cathstyles). 

### Authors and contributors
I will add some credits here eg @srinivasandee.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
